001package com.technototes.library.command;
002
003import java.util.HashMap;
004import java.util.Map;
005
006/**
007 * Root class for all command groups
008 *
009 * @author Alex Stedman
010 */
011public abstract class CommandGroup implements Command {
012    // This is a map from the command to whether it has been run
013    protected Map<Command, Boolean> commandMap;
014    protected boolean countCancel, anyCancelled;
015
016    /**
017     * Create a command group with commands
018     *
019     * @param commands Commands for group
020     */
021    public CommandGroup(boolean countCancel, Command... commands) {
022        commandMap = new HashMap<>();
023        addCommands(commands);
024        this.countCancel = countCancel;
025    }
026
027    /**
028     * Add a command to the group
029     *
030     * @param commands The command
031     * @return this
032     */
033    public CommandGroup addCommands(Command... commands) {
034        for (Command c : commands) {
035            schedule(c);
036            commandMap.put(c, false);
037        }
038        return this;
039    }
040
041    public CommandGroup countCancel() {
042        countCancel = true;
043        return this;
044    }
045
046    public CommandGroup ignoreCancel() {
047        countCancel = false;
048        return this;
049    }
050
051    public abstract void schedule(Command c);
052
053    @Override
054    public void initialize() {
055        commandMap.replaceAll((command, bool) -> false);
056        anyCancelled = false;
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public void execute() {
061        // makes true if command just finished
062        commandMap.replaceAll(
063                (command, bool) -> (countCancel ? command.justFinished() : command.justFinishedNoCancel()) || bool);
064        anyCancelled = commandMap.keySet().stream().anyMatch(Command::isCancelled) || anyCancelled;
065    }
066
067    @Override
068    /** Return if commandgroup is finished
069     *
070     */
071    public abstract boolean isFinished();
072
073    @Override
074    public void end(boolean cancel) {
075        commandMap.keySet().forEach(Command::cancel);
076    }
077}
